import React,{useRef,useState}from'react';import'./BeforeAfterSlider.css';/**
 * BeforeAfterSlider Component
 * Shows two images (before/after) with a draggable slider to reveal more or less of each image.
 *
 * Props:
 * - beforeImg: URL of the 'before' image
 * - afterImg: URL of the 'after' image
 * - beforeLabel: Label for the before image (optional)
 * - afterLabel: Label for the after image (optional)
 */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BeforeAfterSlider=_ref=>{let{beforeImg,afterImg,beforeLabel='Before',afterLabel='After'}=_ref;const containerRef=useRef(null);const[sliderPos,setSliderPos]=useState(50);// percent
const[dragging,setDragging]=useState(false);// Handle drag events
const onDrag=e=>{if(!dragging)return;const rect=containerRef.current.getBoundingClientRect();let x=e.type.startsWith('touch')?e.touches[0].clientX:e.clientX;let percent=(x-rect.left)/rect.width*100;percent=Math.max(0,Math.min(100,percent));setSliderPos(percent);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nv-before-after-slider",ref:containerRef,onMouseMove:onDrag,onMouseUp:()=>setDragging(false),onMouseLeave:()=>setDragging(false),onTouchMove:onDrag,onTouchEnd:()=>setDragging(false),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:beforeImg,alt:beforeLabel,className:"nv-slider-img nv-slider-img--before"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:afterImg,alt:afterLabel,className:"nv-slider-img nv-slider-img--after",style:{clipPath:"inset(0 ".concat(100-sliderPos,"% 0 0)")}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nv-slider-handle",style:{left:"calc(".concat(sliderPos,"% - 16px)")},onMouseDown:()=>setDragging(true),onTouchStart:()=>setDragging(true),role:"slider","aria-valuenow":sliderPos,"aria-valuemin":0,"aria-valuemax":100,tabIndex:0,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nv-slider-handle-bar"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nv-slider-label nv-slider-label--before",children:beforeLabel}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nv-slider-label nv-slider-label--after",children:afterLabel})]});};export default BeforeAfterSlider;
